description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: doomelf

talents.info_text:
Hasten yourself out of phase, teleporting you to a specific location up to 4 spaces away.

You can activate this talent up to twice within the same turn, but the second activation will not be instant.

Afterwards you stay out of phase for 5 turns. In this state your defense is increased by 7, 11, 17, 21, 25 and all your resistances by 7%, 11%, 17%, 21%, 25%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Haste of the Doomed

talents.info_text:
The tortures you had to endure on the Fearscape have increased your resilience.

All detrimental status effects last 8%, 14%, 19%, 23%, 27% less on you and all direct critical hits (physical, mental, spells) against you have a 13%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 45% lower critical multiplier (but always do at least normal damage).
talents.name: Resilience of the Doomed

talents.info_text:
Your original invisibility talent was corrupted and twisted.

You have 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% chance to turn into a d√∫athedlen for 5 turns, when hit by a blow doing at least 10% of your total life.

While in this form you gain the following effects:

  • you have permanent stealth (power 7, 11, 17, 21, 25)
  • your darkness damage is increased by 8%, 12%, 14%, 15%, 16%
  • any non mind and non physical damage you deal above 1, 14, 35, 56, 70 triggers a darkness explosion of radius 1 for half the damage (this can only happen once per turn)
  • when you transform the cooldowns of Haste of the Doomed and Pitiless are reset
talents.name: Corruption of the Doomed

talents.info_text:
You launch a mental assault on the target.

The assult increases the cooldown of any already cooling down talents by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, the duration of any magical, physical or mental detrimental effects by 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and decreases the duration of any magical, physical or mental beneficial effects by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.
talents.name: Pitiless

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: drem

talents.info_text:
Enter a killing frenzy for 3 turns.

During the frenzy the first time you use a class talent it has no cooldown (but does if used twice).

This does not work for inscriptions, talents that take no turn to use, or have fixed cooldowns.
talents.name: Frenzy

talents.info_text:
Your skin grows small spikes coated in dark blight.

When you are hit in melee the attacker starts bleeding black blood for 5 turns that deals 8.00, 14, 21, 26, 30 darkness damage each turn. This effect may only happen once per turn.

You are empowered by the sight of the black blood, for each bleeding creature in radius 2 you gain 5% all resistances, limited to 1, 3, 4, 6, 8 creatures.

The damage will scale with your Magic stat.
talents.name: Spikeskin

talents.info_text:
Your faceless visage is puzzling and emotionless, allowing you to more easily resist mind tricks.

You gain 11, 21, 29, 36, 43 mental save, 27%, 43%, 58%, 71%, 84% confusion immunity.
talents.name: Faceless

talents.info_text:
Your affinity with things that dwell deep beneath the surface allows you to summon a hungering mouth.

The mouth has 1320, 1640, 1960, 2280, 2600 bonus life, lasts for 5, 7, 8, 10, 12 turns, and deals no damage.

Each turn the mouth will draw all creatures in radius 10 3 spaces towards itself and force them to target it.

Its bonus life depends on your Constitution stat and talent level. Many other stats will scale with level.
talents.name: From Below It Devours

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: dwarf

talents.info_text:
Call upon the legendary resilience of the Dwarven race to increase your armour (+7, +11, +17, +21, +25), armour hardiness (+26%, +32%, +34%, +36%, +36%), spell (+12, +15, +21, +25, +30) and physical (+12, +15, +21, +25, +30) saves for 8 turns.

The bonus will increase with your Constitution.
talents.name: Resilience of the Dwarves

talents.info_text:
Dwarf skin is a complex structure, it can automatically react to physical blows to harden itself.

When you are hit in melee, you have a 15% chance to increase your armour total by 13, 27, 38, 48, 56 for 5 turns and fully ignore the attack triggering it.

There is no cooldown to this effect, it can happen while already active.
talents.name: Stoneskin

talents.info_text:
Money is the heart of the Dwarven Empire; it rules over all other considerations.

Increases Physical, Mental and Spell Saves based on the amount of gold you possess.

+1 save every 80, 71, 65, 61, 58 gold, up to +17, +34, +48, +59, +70. (currently +0)
talents.name: Power is Money

talents.info_text:
While the origins of the dwarves remain clouded in mysteries to the other races, it is obvious they share strong ties to the stone.

You can target any wall and immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle.

Works up to 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 grids away (increases with Constitution and talent level).
talents.name: Stone Walking

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: halfling

talents.info_text:
Call upon the luck and cunning of the Little Folk to increase your critical strike chance by 15%, 24%, 37%, 49%, 59% and your saves by 15, 24, 37, 49, 59 for 5 turns.

The bonus will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Luck of the Little Folk

talents.info_text:
Your incredible luck kicks in at just the right moment to save your skin.

Whenever you take 14%, 13%, 12%, 11%, 10% or more of your life from a single attack, you gain Evasion (50%) and 0, 0, 3, 12, 25 additional defense (based on your luck and other defensive stats) for the next 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: Duck and Dodge

talents.info_text:
Halflings have always been a very organised and methodical race; the more foes they face, the more organised they are.

If two or more foes are in sight your Physical Power, Physical Save, Spellpower, Spell Save, Mental Save, and Mindpower are increased by 2.4, 4.8, 7.2, 9.6, 12 per foe (up to 5 foes).
talents.name: Militant Mind

talents.info_text:
Halflings have one of the most powerful military forces in the known world and they have been at war with most other races for thousand of years.

Removes 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 stun, daze, or pin effects, and makes you immune to stuns, dazes and pins for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Indomitable

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: higher

talents.info_text:
Call upon the gift of the highborn to regenerate your body for 10, 17, 30, 42, 55 life every turn and increase healing mod by 15%, 24%, 29%, 32%, 35% for 10 turns.

The life healed will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Gift of the Highborn

talents.info_text:
While Highers are not meant to rule other humans - and show no particular will to do so - they are frequently called to higher duties.

Their nature grants them better senses than other humans.

Increase blindness immunity by 16%, 29%, 38%, 46%, 52%, maximum sight range by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and increases existing infravision, and heightened senses range by 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.

At level 5 each time you hit a target you gain telepathy to all similar creatures in radius 15 for 5 turns.
talents.name: Overseer of Nations

talents.info_text:
Highers were originally created during the Age of Allure by the human Conclave. They are imbued with magic at the very core of their being.

Increase spell save by +10, +22, +33, +43, +53 and arcane resistance by 10%, 18%, 24%, 29%, 33%.

Also when you cast a spell dealing damage, you gain a 20% bonus to the damage type for 5 turns. (This effect has a cooldown.)
talents.name: Born into Magic

talents.info_text:
Activate some of your inner magic, using it to power your abilities. For the next 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns, all active talents will be used without resource cost.

Your resources must still be high enough to initially power the talent, and failure rates (etc.) still apply.
talents.name: Highborn's Bloom

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: krog

talents.info_text:
You unleash the wrath of the wilds for 5 turns.

When you deal damage to a creature while wrath is active you have 7%, 10%, 14%, 17%, 20% chance (100% for the first creature hit) to stun them for 3 turns.

This effect is only checked once per creature per turn.

Chance scales with your Constitution and apply power is the highest or your physical or mind power.
talents.name: Wrath of the Wilds

talents.info_text:
Since ziguranth removed those filthy magic runes from your body you have needed an alternative form of power to sustain your body. Thanks to drake blood you have found that power.

Your blood hardens yourself, passively increasing stun resistance by 27%, 43%, 58%, 71%, 84%, fire resistance by 20%, 25%, 31%, 36%, 40% and dealing 5, 14, 25, 33, 40 fire damage on melee attacks.

You can activate this talent to change which drake aspect to bring forth, altering the elemental type of the bonus.

The resistance and damage scales with your Willpower.

Changing your aspect requires combat experience, you may only do so after slaying 100 enemies (current 0).
talents.name: Drake-Infused Blood

talents.info_text:
Your body is used to pain. When you take a hit of 20% or more of your max life one of your inscription is taken of cooldown.

This effect has a cooldown of 16, 12, 11, 10, 10 turns.
talents.name: Fuel Pain

talents.info_text:
You were created by ziguranth for one purpose only, to wage war on magic!

For 5 turns all damage taken is reduced by 24%, 32%, 39%, 44%, 48% and when you activate this talent your Wrath of the Wild is put off cooldown.

When you learn this talent you become so strong you can dual-wield any kind of one handed weapons.
talents.name: Warborn

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: ogre

talents.info_text:
You enter an ogric wrath for 5, 6, 9, 10, 12 turns, increasing your stun and pinning resistances by 20% and all damage done by 10%.

In addition, whenever you use an infusion or rune, miss a melee attack or any damage you deal is reduced by a damage shield or similar effect you gain a charge of Ogre Fury(up to 5 charges, each lasts 7 turns).

Each charge grants 20% critical damage power and 5% critical strike chance.

You lose a charge each time you deal a critical strike.

The duration will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Ogric Wrath

talents.info_text:
An ogre's body is acclimated to spells and inscriptions.

Increases spell save by 7, 13, 19, 24, 29 and improves the contribution of primary stats on infusions and runes by 18%, 24%, 29%, 33%, 37%.

At level 5 your body is so strong you can use a two handed weapon in your main hand while still using an offhand item.

When using a two handed weapon this way you suffer a 20% accuracy, physical power, spellpower and mindpower penalty, decreasing by 5% per size category above big; also all damage procs from your weapons are reduced by 50%.
talents.name: Grisly Constitution

talents.info_text:
When you crit you have a 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% chance to reduce by 1 the remaining cooldown of one of your inscriptions and of any saturations effects.

This effect can only happen once per turn.
talents.name: Scar-Scripted Flesh

talents.info_text:
Instantly removes runic and infusion saturations.

For 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns your inscriptions cooldown twice as fast.

At level 5 your command over inscriptions is so good that you can use one more (you still need a category point to unlock it; you need to exit the levelup screen to validate it).
talents.name: Writ Large

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: orc

talents.info_text:
Summons your lust for blood and destruction, especially when the odds are against you.

You increase your damage by 10% + 1.0%, 2.3%, 3.9%, 5.0%, 6.0% per enemy in line of sight up to 5 (max 15%, 22%, 29%, 35%, 40%) for 3 turns.

The damage bonus will increase with your Constitution.
talents.name: Orcish Fury

talents.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 10 turns.

Also increase physical save by +6, +11, +15, +19, +23.
talents.name: Hold the Ground

talents.info_text:
Orcs have seen countless battles, and won many of them.

You revel in the defeat of your foes, gaining 10%, 11%, 13%, 14%, 14% damage resistance for 2 turns each time you kill an enemy.

The resistance will scale with your talent level and Constitution.

Passively increase all damage penetration by 9%, 13%, 14%, 15%, 16%.
talents.name: Skirmisher

talents.info_text:
Call upon the will of all of the Orc Prides to survive this battle.

You remove up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 detrimental effect(s) then heal for 233, 289, 331, 365, 395 life.

The healing will increase with your talent level and Willpower.
talents.name: Pride of the Orcs

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.. when its head is cut off and replaced with a parasite.
name: parasite

talents.info_text:
You try to bite off your foe with your head for 50%, 76%, 107%, 130%, 150% blight weapon damage.

If the target falls under 20% life you have 20%, 33%, 48%, 60%, 70% chances to outright kill it (bosses are immune).

Whenever you succesfully bite a foe you regenerate 3.0, 8.9, 16, 21, 25 life per turn for 5 turns.

Instant kill chances and regeneration increase with your Constitution stat and weapon damage increases with the highest of your Strength, Dexterity or Magic stat.
talents.name: Take a Bite

talents.info_text:
Without the distraction of thoughts or self your body reacts faster and better to aggressions.

Increases global speed by 10%, 19%, 24%, 27%, 29%.
talents.name: Ultra Instinct

talents.info_text:
The parasite corruption seeps into your body, strengthening it.

Increases blight, darkness, temporal and acid resistances by 24%, 35%, 39%, 42%, 43% but decreases nature and light resistances by 8%, 11%, 13%, 14%, 14%.
talents.name: Corrupting Influence

talents.info_text:
Creates a shell around you, absorbing 498, 592, 662, 719, 768 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

The total damage the shield can absorb increases with your Constitution.
talents.name: Horror Shell

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: shalore

talents.info_text:
Call upon the grace of the Eternals to increase your general speed by 10%, 18%, 29%, 38%, 47% for 5 turns.

The speed bonus will increase with your Dexterity or Magic (whichever is higher).
talents.name: Grace of the Eternals

talents.info_text:
Reality bends slightly in the presence of a Shaloren, due to their inherent magical nature.

Increases critical chance by 4%, 7%, 9%, 12%, 14% and critical strike power by 7%, 13%, 19%, 24%, 29%.
talents.name: Magic of the Eternals

talents.info_text:
As the only immortal race of Eyal, Shaloren have learnt, over the long years, to use their innate inner magic to protect themselves.

25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 55% chance to become invisible (power 7, 12, 18, 22, 25) for 5 turns, when hit by a blow doing at least 10% of their total life.
talents.name: Secrets of the Eternals

talents.info_text:
The world grows old as you stand through the ages. To you, time is different.

Reduces the time remaining on detrimental effects by 4, 8, 9, 11, 12, most cooling down talents by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and increases the time remaining on beneficial effects by 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 (up to 2 times the current duration).
talents.name: Timeless

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: thalore

talents.info_text:
Call upon the power of the Eternals, increasing all damage by 11%, 13%, 16%, 18%, 20% and reducing all damage taken by 11%, 13%, 16%, 18%, 20% for 5 turns.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Wrath of the Woods

talents.info_text:
Thaloren have always been a free people, living in their beloved forest and never caring much about the world outside.

Increase Physical and Mental Save by +9, +17, +24, +30, +36.
talents.name: Unshackled

talents.info_text:
You are part of the wood; it shields you from corruption.

Increase disease immunity by 39%, 63%, 74%, 79%, 83%, blight resistance by 4.5%, 7.5%, 9.7%, 12%, 13%, and all resistances by 3.0%, 4.9%, 6.3%, 7.6%, 8.7%.
talents.name: Guardian of the Wood

talents.info_text:
Nature is with you; you can always feel the call of the woods.

Summons two elite Treants to your side for 8 turns.

The treants have a global resistance equal to your blight resistance, and can stun, knockback and taunt your foes.

Their power increases with your Willpower.
talents.name: Nature's Pride

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: whitehooves

talents.info_text:
Improves your undead body, increasing Strength and Magic by 4, 7, 10, 13, 15.

Each time you move you gain a charge (up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5) of death momentum, increasing your movement speed by 20%.

Each turn spent not moving you loose a charge.
talents.name: Whitehooves

talents.info_text: Your undead skin hardens under stress. Each charge of death momentum also increases all flat damage resistance by 2, 4, 5, 7, 8.
talents.name: Dead Hide

talents.info_text:
You summon your undead energies to instantly build up death momentum to its maximum possible charges.

The effect will only start to decrease after 5, 8, 10, 12, 14 turns.

In addition, the death momentum effect also grants +3%, +4%, +4%, +5%, +5% to all damage per charge.
talents.name: Lifeless Rush

talents.info_text:
You send a wave of darkness at your foe, dealing 50, 104, 164, 211, 250 darkness damage.

The darkness will drain a part of it's life essence (only works on living targets) to increases the duration before the next charge of death momentum is used by 7, 9, 11, 13, 14.

Only usable when you have the death momentum effect.

The damage scales with your Magic stat.
talents.name: Essence Drain

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: yeek

talents.info_text:
Shatters the mind of your victim, giving you full control over its actions for 5, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns.

When the effect ends, you pull out your mind and the victim's body collapses, dead.

This effect does not work on rares, bosses, or undeads.

The duration will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Dominant Will

talents.info_text:
Your mind becomes more attuned to the Way, and is shielded from outside effects.

Increase confusion and silence immunities by 28%, 47%, 58%, 66%, 71%, and your Mental Save by +7, +13, +19, +24, +29.
talents.name: Unity

talents.info_text:
Yeeks live fast, think fast, and sacrifice fast for the Way.

Increase global speed by 6.0%, 11%, 15%, 18%, 22%.
talents.name: Quickened

talents.info_text:
Reach through the collective psionic gestalt of the yeeks, the Way, to call for immediate help.

Summons up to 3 yeek mindslayers to your side for 6 turns.
talents.name: Wayist

description: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: yeti

talents.info_text:
Your yeti is attuned to the cold climates.

For 5 turns all damage you deal has 30%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chances to encase the target in an iceblock for 3 turns.

While Algid Rage is up you easily pierce through iceblocks, reducing the damage they absorb by 50%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Algid Rage

talents.info_text: Your yeti's fur acts like a shield, providing 16%, 23%, 29%, 34%, 38% cold resistance, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21%, 23% physical resistance and 9, 17, 24, 30, 36 magical save.
talents.name: Thick Fur

talents.info_text:
Your yeti's body is very resilient to detrimental effects.

Each time you are hit by a physical, magical, or mental detrimental effect your body reacts with a burst of healing.

This effect heals for 51, 69, 79, 84, 89 and can only occur up to 3 times per turn.

It increases with your Constitution stat.
talents.name: Resilient Body

talents.info_text:
You willingly fry a few parts of your yeti's brain to trigger a huge psionic blast in cone of radius 5.

Any foes caught in the blast will suffer 50, 117, 193, 251, 300 mind damage and be confused (35% power) for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Constitution and the apply power will be the highest of your mind, spell, or physical power.
talents.name: Mindwave
